In a company statement, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey for a long time to come. The three didn't always agree, particularly when it came to coping with rules in China that require Web-search providers to censor results that government officials deem inappropriate.
